/blog/the-secret-handshake.title: The Secret Handshake
/blog/the-secret-handshake.body:
A few weeks ago I found out about a site called ‘The Secret Handshake’. It’s a site with advice from a lot of my favorite designers, on topics like creating your Resume, the Application Process and tips on what makes a great Portfolio. I find myself visiting it at least once a week, clicking random photos to learn and be inspired.

Check it out at www.learnthesecrethandshake.com.
